header.title: Conference Venue
header.description: The conference will be held at Ajay Binay Institute of Technology, Odisha. It is conveniently located in Bhubaneswar, the capital of Odisha, India. Bhubaneswar is well connected to other major cities of the country via regular flights and trains. From the station/airport, you can take private cabs or taxis or public transport to the conference venue.

address.title: Address:
details: Markat Nagar, Cuttack Development Authority Sector - 1,

transport.title: By Plane
transport.description: The nearest airport station is Biju Patnaik International Airport (Bhubaneswar).

transport.title: By Train
transport.description: The nearest railway station is Cuttack Railway station.
